notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: ZM supervised the study in Guinea, analyzed the data and drafted the final manuscript. WR designed the study, analyzed the data, and was a major contributor in writing the manuscript. DA and BS performed sample testing and managed data collection. MN supervised the study and advised on sample selection and management. CKC was a major contributor in data analysis and writing the manuscript. YBA designed the study, supervised the study in Guinea and drafted the final manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
